name: 13 Dawgs
description: 13 Dawgs is a hybrid of G13 and Chemdawg genetics bred by Canadian LP Delta 9 BioTech. The two potent strains mix to create a balance between indica and sativa effects. 13 Dawgs has a sweet earthy musk that brings a blend of woody citrus flavors. The effects of 13 Dawgs induce a happy, relaxed body buzz with a creative and focused mind that counters depression and stimulates the appetite.
descriptionPlain: 13 Dawgs is a hybrid of G13 and Chemdawg genetics bred by Canadian LP Delta 9 BioTech. The two potent strains mix to create a balance between indica and sativa effects. 13 Dawgs has a sweet earthy musk that brings a blend of woody citrus flavors. The effects of 13 Dawgs induce a happy, relaxed body buzz with a creative and focused mind that counters depression and stimulates the appetite.

highlightedReviews.text:
This strain is hella nice :)
I am diagnosed with general anxiety disorder, minor PTSD, and previous Psychological disorder. Basically I have a lot of stress and depression and this is a very nice strain that clears my head and gives me a mellow, uplifting sensation when I'm down. Great for watching Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke ;)

Ups and downs come with the deal with this hybrid. Sativa boost out of the gate followed by waves of crazy uber-hunger and heavy eye lids. I managed to fight off the urge to sleep and motivated once again to my guitar. In the end it was slumbers battle.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: CBD Shark, Afghan Hawaiian, 13 Dawgs, Damn Sour, and More
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The Leafly strain database now exceeds 1,200 varieties, but our collection is far from finished. These ten strains are only a few among many newly added varieties, so don't forget to check out all of the other newcomers in the Explorer!
 
   1. CBD Shark
Characteristics of CBD Shark:

80/20 high-CBD indica-dominant strain
Cross between Shark Shock and an unknown high-CBD variety
Fruity, herbal aroma
Clear-headed, soothing effects
May help with pain, anxiety, and inflammation

 
   2. Afghan Hawaiian
Characteristics of Afghan Hawaiian:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between UK Cheese and Lavender
Sweet and earthy cheese aroma
Euphoric and relaxing
May help with neurological disorders and spasticity

 
   3. 13 Dawgs
Characteristics of 13 Dawgs:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between G13 and Chemdawg
Woody, citrus aroma
Happy, relaxed, focused effects
May help with depression and appetite loss

 
   4. Damn Sour
Characteristics of Damn Sour:

Mostly sativa strain
Bred from Sage N Sour genetics
Sour, diesel aroma
Uplifting and intensely euphoric
May help with aches and appetite loss

 
   5. Afghani CBD
Characteristics of Afghani CBD:

High-CBD variant of the landrace indica Afghani
Earthy, hashy aroma
Relaxing, therapeutic properties
May help with insomnia, chronic pain, and stress disorders

 
   6. Aberdeen
Characteristics of Aberdeen:

Variety of Agent Orange
Cross between Orange Velvet and Jack the Ripper
Sweet orange and citrus aroma
Happy, uplifting effects
May help with anxiety, migraines, and gastrointestinal disorders

 
   7. Jenni
Characteristics of Jenni:

Mostly sativa strain
Modest THC level suitable for novice consumers
Sweet, fruity aroma
Soothing, clear-headed effects

 
   8. Bedica
Characteristics of Bedica:

Mostly indica strain
Sedating, calming effects
May help with stress and insomnia

 
   9. Avi
Characteristics of Avi:

50/50 high-CBD hybrid strain
Sweet fruit and berry aroma
Relaxing and calming effects
May help with body aches and pains

 
   10. Argyle
Characteristics of Argyle:

Indica-dominant high-CBD hybrid
Variety of Nordle (cross between Afghani and Sensi Star)
Herbal, fruity aroma
Mellow, calming buzz
May help with pain and muscle spasms
